name: Blast Survive Repeat
description:
Stuck in a strange, whimsical building you're surrounded by funny-looking little creatures that explode when they get too close. Try to protect yourself and stay alive for as long as you can before your enemies overwhelm you or your time runs out.

Features
  • 3D world
  • 2D enemies
  • Weapon Upgrades
Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Look/Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • R - Reload (also automatic when magazine empty)
  • Esc - Pause menu with options
  • E - Open Shop

created by mimimi
Sound Credits
  • Elevator Bossa Nova - Bensound
  • Maiar - Syiphorous
  • Sound Effects  created/distributed by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)
  • Explosion Sound Effects - alpha
  • Colour Palette by Space Sandwich on Lospec
